response.job_title: Business Analytics Growth Executive at Infobip
response.summary: Professional with relevant experience in manufacturing and pharmaceutical industries, generating insights through a logical approach to big data sources. With remarkable skills for negotiating and relating with third parties, leading tenders and main SLA contracting for the affiliate. My solid knowledge in finance make me suitable for budget planning and management in important company’s projects.
response.skills: Inteligencia de negocios, Estrategia comercial, Gestión de proyectos, Planificación estratégica, Control de costes, Estrategia empresarial, Análisis de datos, Análisis financiero, Ingeniería industrial, Planificación financiera, Planificación de proyectos, Gestión de presupuestos, Control de presupuestos, Organización de eventos, Optimización de procesos, KPI, Análisis de negocio, Capacidad de análisis, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel

profile_positions.description:
Accountable for covering business and commercial points with Mobile Operators by doing proper market intelligence and proposing adequate strategies for America region and the company’s products. Navigating requirements in dedicated markets to support growth and bringing additional profit from the top customers and partners. Supporting the region in reaching financial independence.

• Proposed business models and monitored the pricing strategy for A2P exclusive destinations in the region, generating 440 k$ additional monthly gross profit over the region’s target.
• Led and presented the business case for the largest regional investment in the Caribbean and Central America for over 10M$ yearly budget; analyzed possible case scenarios to address risks and facilitate decision making. Currently monitoring the deal’s key indicators’ by extracting raw data from Qliksense to ensure the desired outcome and optimize it.
• Quantified market potential for new entry products by forecasting vertical and industry growth, using available CRM data and market insights, as well as defined buying and selling prices for the go-to-market strategy, generating over 30% gross margin.
profile_positions.title: Business Growth Executive

profile_positions.description:
Assuring best possible financial results by actively contributing to company’s revenue, profit optimization and quality of service through data-driven decision making and analysis of data from various sources (e.g. live traffic, CRM systems). Working on improvements and suggesting upgrades on all business-related processes, procedures, tools and platform service that could result in improved profitability or quality.

• Generated a complete profile analysis for the region’s most relevant client, that enabled decision making for its profitability and ensured over 50 k$ monthly profit over 6 months.
• Tracked the regional clients’ operation, locating profit leakages and addressing them to avoid unnecessary opportunity costs, achieving in average 18 k$ additional profit assurance.
• Continuously aligned sales and commercial teams with the regional pricing strategy, driving the region to meet profitability OKRs.
profile_positions.title: Customer Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Work closely with key cross-functional areas to understand procurement requirements and develop cost saving opportunities. Accountable for implementing and monitoring the Preferred Supplier List (PSL), as well as generating insights from spend data bases to back up saving opportunities and analytical decisions for the affiliate.

• Overachieved savings target for the affiliate, delivering over $780 MCOP through negotiations and process optimization.
• Led important negotiations and set annual pipeline for main SLA review and renewal by analyzing total spend.
• Enabled clear communication in budget follow-up meetings and allowed areas to have a holistic view of their committed spend and available resources for investment.
profile_positions.title: Planning and Procurement Analyst

profile_positions.description: Accountable for operational expenses estimation in sales and promotion activities, with periodical reviews on budget deviation, as well as supporting by calculating and communicating the incentives program for sales commissioning and controlling purchase orders and invoicing for the area.
profile_positions.title: Diabetes Promotion Intern

profile_positions.description: Product costing with ABC methodology, identifying with detail direct and indirect costs. Abstracting and characterizing the production process to define its inputs and outputs in relation with key processes, by analyzing plant physics and material flow from raw materials to finished products; statistics generation and measurable indexes for decision making.
profile_positions.title: Costing Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Accountable for attending and solving client requirements by managing the tools available (CRM); as well as product upsell and cross-sell promotion and trainee development by generating dynamic activities for concept learning, tool management and motivation.
profile_positions.title: Customer Account Executive, Mentoring and Training

company.name: Infobip
company.description:
Infobip is a global leader in omnichannel engagement powering a broad range of messaging channels, tools and solutions for advanced customer engagement, authentication and security. We help our clients and partners overcome the complexity of consumer communications, grow their business and enhance the customer experience – all in a fast, secure and reliable way.

Quality engineering is the backbone of everything we do. Building great customer solutions on the edge of innovation means we hire, grow, and retain the best engineering talent worldwide. Over the last 15 years, we’ve grown into an Engineering Powerhouse with 70+ offices in 6 continents and over 3,700 experts, aiming to change how the world communicates.

We see ourselves as humble engineers led by our philosophy of learning by doing and fueled by our passion for technology. This is why all our solutions are entirely in-house developed, and we are proud of all the talents we have in our company!
